segments.text: How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would like to look at some of your products .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you have anything specific in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , to be honest , I mostly use Sarah Winter products now.But I'm not happy with them . So I would like to change companies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you made a good choice . Coming to us , I mean.We have a full range of products from cosmetics to skin cleansers and moisturizers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you have in foundation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our foundation is very high quality . Only the finest ingredients.It will moisturize your skin and it has a sun block rating of 8 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What colors do you have in foundation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me show you.We have this rose color . We also have different shades of beige .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The color I use now is rose.How much does this rose foundation cost ? The 100ml bottle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In this size , we sell it for 53.95 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! That's expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What you're paying for , Ma'am , are the ingredients.It is a very high quality product .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . I need some mascara too.Do you have a good thickening mascara ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Here is our thickening mascara.We also have mascara designed to lengthen the eyelashes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . And I want to consider your eye shadow too.Do you have a color chart I can look at ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a very wide selection of colors.And our eye shadow is specially designed to moisturize the skin.So it is very gentle on your eyelids . Would you like to sample some ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sure . I will need to clean off my own eye shadow first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can help you with that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
